item.title: AIA Group CFO on 1H25 Results
item.description: Garth Jones, CFO of AIA Group, discusses the insurer’s 16% growth in new value of business in the first half of 2025, and his outlook on opportunities for growth for the firm. He speaks exclusively wi

item.title: AIA Says Incoming Chair Tucker to Focus on Governance, Strategy
item.description: AIA Group Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Lee Yuan Siong said incoming non-executive chair Mark Tucker will focus on governance and strategy when he starts at the insurer later this year.

item.title: AIA Says Incoming Chair Tucker to Focus on Governance, Strategy
item.description: AIA Group Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Lee Yuan Siong said incoming non-executive chair Mark Tucker will focus on governance and strategy when he starts at the insurer later this year.

item.title: AIA’s Hong Kong Sales Lift Profitability as Dividend Rises
item.description: AIA Group Ltd. reported strong growth in new business value in the first half of the year, underpinned by insurance sales in Hong Kong, as the firm hiked its dividend.

item.title: AIA’s Hong Kong Sales Lift Profitability as Dividend Rises
item.description: AIA Group Ltd. reported strong growth in new business value in the first half of the year, underpinned by insurance sales in Hong Kong, as the firm hiked its dividend.

item.title: Hong Kong Asks Insurers to Return Investing Roles From Singapore
item.description: Life insurers have become the latest target in Hong Kong’s efforts to compete with Singapore in retaining talent and capital.
